name: スーパーマリサランド
summary:
Suupaa Marisa Rando (スーパーマリサランド, lit. "Super Marisa Land") is an amusing doujin game starring none other than Marisa Kirisame. The game imitates Mario to a certain degree since the name is a parody of Super Mario World, and if you're a hardcore Mario player you're bound to recognize a few familiar elements and sections of the map. Marisa can eat those mushrooms to grow in size of "head proportions," and special mushrooms double her size so that she can shoot fireballs and destroy blocks. The game features many different enemies and no end to levels. 

via.http://en.touhouwiki.net/wiki/Super_Marisa_Land
